column4: Latest;Pursat: A marijuana crop grown on around 2 hectares was raided and burned by Veal Veng District Police in cooperation with District Military Police in Pursat Province.------Veal Veng District Police Inspectorate in cooperation with the District Gendarmerie on July 18
column5: 2020 at 11:00 AM visited the site at O ​​Valley 70 located near Dey Krahorm village
column8: Pursat province.------Due to the geographical location
column9: hidden in mountains 30 km away from National Road No. 55
column10: the police could not catch the farmers
column11: but burned the marijuana plants together with a hut built on the plantation. MCPN
